CARDINAL . The relevant provision of the LAW reads as follows :
Article CARDINAL
“ The budgetary system of GPE is built on the principles of just and impartial distribution of social wealth among citizens and territorial communities .
All expenditure by the ORG for social purposes , and the amount and aims thereof , shall be determined by LAW of GPE .
The ORG aspires to achieve a balanced budget for GPE .
Regular reports on revenue and expenditure of ORG shall be made public . ”

If PERSON has not approved the full costs of salaries and additional payments , the corresponding number of staff of the institutions financed from the budget shall be made redundant . ”
